dmca.title: Hosted site, serious abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: webmaster@zeldalegacy.net [mailto:webmaster@zeldalegacy.net] 
Posted At: Saturday, November 25, 2006 6:19 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Hosted site, serious abuse
Subject: Hosted site, serious abuse


Jonathan Billings Complaintant
Contact Email - webmaster@zeldalegacy.net Phone - If needed, we can
speak via telephone

Reverse DNS lookup had claimed 'The Plant' (www.theplanet.com) hosts the
site www.ffshrine.org, zs.ffshrine.org. 
zs.ffshrine.org, the site in question, has plagiarized many written
publications of several of my affiliated and networked sites.  We have,
on several occassions, requested the owner remove the content in
question, but to no avail. 

Plagiarism is punishable by law and is a misdameanor.  All materials
published on these websites are copywritten material whether the
copyright was visable or not (according to laws established in 1989, the
copyright symbol does not have to be present in the text for it to be
copyright protected).

The site suspected of plagiarism is http://zs.ffshrine.org.  We have
made a very large list of our affiliated sites that have been violated.

Please review them to ensure yourselves of this.  While we do not want
to have any legal dispute with theplanet.com, we would like to have the
material removed from the offending site, and/or, this site removed from
its host server.

When any action is taken, please contact us using the contact email, or
request direct phone contact.  We trust this matter can be resolved
without problems.


Plagiarized Publications and Materials ::

http://zs.ffshrine.org/legend-of-zelda/bosses.php
